docs.snippet: Last week, Denver Nuggets players broke their huddle with a chant of "1-2-3 ... Six weeks," interpreted by some as a countdown to the end of a season gone sour....
docs.lead_paragraph: Last week, Denver Nuggets players broke their huddle with a chant of "1-2-3 ... Six weeks," interpreted by some as a countdown to the end of a season gone sour.

headline.main: Denver Nuggets Fire Coach Brian Shaw With Team in Slide
headline.print_headline: Denver Nuggets Fire Coach Brian Shaw With Team in Slide

docs.snippet: New York Rangers general manager Glen Sather struck the first bold move of the weekend by acquiring playmaking defenseman Keith Yandle in a trade with the Arizona Coyotes....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York Rangers general manager Glen Sather struck the first bold move of the weekend by acquiring playmaking defenseman Keith Yandle in a trade with the Arizona Coyotes.

headline.main: Rangers' Rivals Counter by Stocking Up at NHL Trade Deadline
